channel.title: [711] Safe PK and Dangerous PK
channel.description:
I need help adding the safe and dangerous pk zones at clan wars. Like i got the wilderness zone to work but the attack option is not there.
I added this [code]|| (tile.getX() >= 2948 && tile.getX() <= 3067 && tile.getY() >= 5512 && tile.getY() <= 5626);[/code] For Dangerous Under [code]public static final boolean isAtWild(WorldTile tile) {[/code]
I know i need to add more but i don't know what to add or where to add it, please help :)
